meta.job_title: Sr. Managing Director of Projects and Business Development

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide overall leadership for project execution including: Strategic problem-solving solutions to meet client needs, Project set up process including scope, reporting and document retention, Review of contracts, subcontracts and other contractual documentation, Evaluation of baseline schedule and assumptions, Review of estimates and cost reports, Support for technical evaluations and root cause analysis, Support contractor work scope development, evaluation and contract negotiation processes, Audit on-site construction progress evaluations, Preparation and/or review project status presentations and update reports, Support for monthly OAC meetings and lead Client Sr. Management communication, Oversight of change order and pay application administration, Oversight of project schedule management processes, Support damages quantification, Project QA/QC executive sponsor, Project close out, Mediation/litigation support as required

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Engineering or Construction Management or equivalent work experience
